sentences.en: Bassoon diameter well cementation is one of project of maritime artesian well special operation.
sentences.cn: 大管径固井是海上钻井工程中的一项非凡作业.

sentences.en: Calcite cementation seens a possibility where lime grains or calcareous organisms are abundant.
sentences.cn: 在灰质颗粒或钙质生物丰富的地方,方解石胶结作用似乎是有可能的.

sentences.en: Clay coats can be particularly important as inhibitors of later quartz cementation.
sentences.cn: 粘土包壳作为石英晚期胶结作用的抑制剂可能是特别重要的.

sentences.en: Constructive diageneses includes pressure solution while destructive diageneses include cementation compaction silication and filling.
sentences.cn: 而破坏性成岩作用包括胶结作用、压实作用、硅化作用、充填作用.

sentences.en: Deep caries based by the glass ions cementation agent, could significantly reduce composite resin pulp stimulation to protect pulp, and better effect.
sentences.cn: 深龋经玻璃离子粘固剂垫底后，能明显减轻复合树脂对牙髓的刺激作用，从而护髓效果更佳。

sentences.en: Metallic cementation is the common use of the material surface modification.
sentences.cn: 渗金属是材料表面改性的常用手段之一.

sentences.en: Mud fluid's density and flow are two important parameters during well cementation.
sentences.cn: 水泥浆的密度和流量是固井施工过程中的两个重要参数.

sentences.en: Stardard getting ready for, high technology artificer fabrication, stardard cementation, effect is also very satisfied.
sentences.cn: 正规的预备, 高技术的技工, 正规粘结, 效果也是很满意的.

sentences.en: The aluminized coating on K 438 superalloy was prepared by pack cementation.
sentences.cn: 采用固体粉末包埋渗铝法,在K438高温合金表面制备渗铝涂层.

sentences.en: The method of phosphor - gypsum cementation and filling technology is introduced with the design sample.
sentences.cn: 通过设计实例,介绍了磷石膏作为充填骨料充填井下的方法.

sentences.en: The product color bright, the cementation strength is good, guarantees your packing reliable safety.
sentences.cn: 产品颜色鲜艳 、 粘接力佳, 确保您的包装牢固安全.

sentences.en: The strong cementation are of importance that form the result of the worse reservoir space.
sentences.cn: 造成了砂岩的有效储集空间较差的结果.

sentences.en: The synthetic unconsolidated samples with weak cementation and high porosity were prepared using physical simulation technique.
sentences.cn: 利用物理模拟技术制作了一组微弱胶结、非固结高孔隙度人造样本.

sentences.en: They are usually carried out industrially by pack cementation or hot dip process.
sentences.cn: 目前工业上常用的渗铝方法有固体包装法和热浸法.

sentences.en: To be able to relate the cementation of reservoirs to other events would be quite useful.
sentences.cn: 把储集层的胶结作用和其他事件联系起来是很有用的.

sentences.en: Uniformity of annulus flow is important in well cementation.
sentences.cn: 偏心环空流动的均匀性在固井工程中有重要影响.
